results.title: Evaluating the availability of essential drugs for hypertension, diabetes and asthma in rural Rwanda, 2018.
results.text_hl: For all three drugs, the median lead time was 7.5 days (IQR 5.5-11.5) at the hospital vs. 5 days (IQR 3-6) in @<m>DISEASE_603663</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:603663 @@@RHCs@@@. Stock status for @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@ was below the 4-week minimum stock level for 2/12 months at the hospital vs. 7/12 months at the @<m>DISEASE_603663</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:603663 @@@RHCs@@@, while @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and inhaled @CHEMICAL_Albuterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000420 @@@salbutamol@@@ were below the 4-week minimum stock levels for respectively 1/12 and 4/12 months at both hospital and @<m>DISEASE_603663</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:603663 @@@RHCs@@@.

citations.NLM: Mbonyinshuti F, Takarinda KC, Ade S, Manzi M, Iradukunda PG, Kabatende J, Habiyaremye T, Kayumba PC. Evaluating the availability of essential drugs for hypertension, diabetes and asthma in rural Rwanda, 2018. Public Health Action. 2021 Mar 21;11(1):5-11. PMID: 33777715

results.title: An 'omics approach to investigate the growth effects of environmentally relevant concentrations of guanylurea exposure on Japanese medaka (Oryzias latipes).
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is a widely prescribed pharmaceutical used in the treatment of numerous @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_603663</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:603663 @@@health disorders@@@, including @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@Type 2 Diabetes@@@, and as a results of its widespread use, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is thought to be the most prevalent pharmaceutical in the aquatic environment by weight.

citations.NLM: Ussery EJ, Nielsen KM, Simmons D, Pandelides Z, Mansfield C, Holdway D. An 'omics approach to investigate the growth effects of environmentally relevant concentrations of guanylurea exposure on Japanese medaka (Oryzias latipes). Aquat Toxicol. 2021 Jan 29;232():105761. PMID: 33550114

results.title: Effect of Metformin on Different Non-Diabetes Related Conditions, a Special Focus on Malignant Conditions: Review of Literature
results.text_hl: This review has summarized most of the non-glycemic effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has been solidly shown to be effective in weight control with certain medications, effective in neuroprotection, in endothelial @<m>DISEASE_603663</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:603663 @@@health@@@, in control of anti-@SPECIES_11676 @@@HIV@@@ agent side effects and many other crucial @<m>DISEASE_603663</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:603663 @@@health@@@ jeopardies.

citations.NLM: Abdelgadir E, Ali R, Rashid F, Bashier A. Effect of Metformin on Different Non-Diabetes Related Conditions, a Special Focus on Malignant Conditions: Review of Literature J Clin Med Res. 2017 May;9(5):388-395. PMID: 28392858

results.title: Developmental and Full-Life Cycle Exposures to Guanylurea and Guanylurea-Metformin Mixtures Results in Adverse Effects on Japanese Medaka (Oryzias latipes).
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is currently thought to be the highest drug by weight released into the aquatic environment, as a direct result of its widespread use in the treatment of a number of @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_603663</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:603663 @@@health disorders@@@.
